name: onError
description: Defined in Application.cfc, invoked when an exception occurrs that was not caught by a cftry or cfcatch statement.

params.name: exception
params.description: A structure containing the exception similar to what the cfcatch tag has.

params.name: eventName
params.description: The name of the application event at which the exception occurred. If no onRequest method is defined then an empty string may be passed.
